title: Caribbean Cabbage with a Spicy Wine Sauce
ingredients: ['120ml water', '1/2 medium cabbage, cored and cut into wedges', '1 ear sweetcorn', '110g butter, melted', '2 tablespoons dry vermouth or white wine', '1/2 teaspoon minced shallots', '2 large cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'crushed red chilli flakes to taste']
